description: Provides details about all active and terminated Automation executions.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters used to limit the scope of executions that are requested. (dict) --- A filter used to match specific automation executions. This is used to limit the scope of Automation execution information returned. One or more keys to limit the results. The values used to limit the execution information associated with the filter's key. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: One or more keys to limit the results.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The values used to limit the execution information associated with the filter's key.

nested_items.name: AutomationExecutionMetadataList
nested_items.description: The list of details about each automation execution which has occurred which matches the filter specification, if any.

nested_items.name: AutomationExecutionId
nested_items.description: The execution ID.

nested_items.name: DocumentName
nested_items.description: The name of the Automation runbook used during execution.

nested_items.name: DocumentVersion
nested_items.description: The document version used during the execution.

nested_items.name: AutomationExecutionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the execution.

nested_items.name: ExecutionStartTime
nested_items.description: The time the execution started.

nested_items.name: ExecutionEndTime
nested_items.description: The time the execution finished. This isn't populated if the execution is still in progress.

nested_items.name: ExecutedBy
nested_items.description: The IAM role ARN of the user who ran the automation.

nested_items.name: LogFile
nested_items.description: An S3 bucket where execution information is stored.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: The Automation execution mode.

nested_items.name: ParentAutomationExecutionId
nested_items.description: The execution ID of the parent automation.

nested_items.name: CurrentStepName
nested_items.description: The name of the step that is currently running.

nested_items.name: CurrentAction
nested_items.description: The action of the step that is currently running.

nested_items.name: FailureMessage
nested_items.description: The list of execution outputs as defined in the Automation runbook.

nested_items.name: TargetParameterName
nested_items.description: The list of execution outputs as defined in the Automation runbook.

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: The targets defined by the user when starting the automation.
Key=tag-key,Values=tag-value-1,tag-value-2

nested_items.name: TargetMaps
nested_items.description: The specified key-value mapping of document parameters to target resources.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResolvedTargets
nested_items.description: A list of targets that resolved during the execution.

nested_items.name: ParameterValues
nested_items.description: A list of parameter values sent to targets that resolved during the Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Truncated
nested_items.description: A boolean value indicating whether the resolved target list is truncated.

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The MaxConcurrency value specified by the user when starting the automation.

nested_items.name: MaxErrors
nested_items.description: The MaxErrors value specified by the user when starting the automation.

nested_items.name: Target
nested_items.description: The list of execution outputs as defined in the Automation runbook.

nested_items.name: AutomationType
nested_items.description: Use this filter with  DescribeAutomationExecutions. Specify either Local or CrossAccount. CrossAccount is an Automation that runs in multiple Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts. For more information, see Running automations in multiple Amazon Web Services Regions and accounts in the Amazon Web Services Systems Manager User Guide.

nested_items.name: AlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm applied to your automation.

nested_items.name: IgnorePollAlarmFailure
nested_items.description: When this value is true, your automation or command continues to run in cases where we can't retrieve alarm status information from CloudWatch. In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm specified in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: TriggeredAlarms
nested_items.description: The CloudWatch alarm that was invoked by the automation.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationsURL
nested_items.description: A publicly accessible URL for a file that contains the TargetLocations body. Currently, only files in presigned Amazon S3 buckets are supported.

nested_items.name: AutomationSubtype
nested_items.description: The subtype of the Automation operation. Currently, the only supported value is ChangeRequest.

nested_items.name: ScheduledTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the Automation operation is scheduled to start.

nested_items.name: Runbooks
nested_items.description: Information about the Automation runbooks that are run during a runbook workflow in Change Manager.

nested_items.name: DocumentName
nested_items.description: The name of the Automation runbook used in a runbook workflow.

nested_items.name: DocumentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Automation runbook used in a runbook workflow.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The key-value map of execution parameters, which were supplied when calling StartChangeRequestExecution.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TargetParameterName
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter used as the target resource for the rate-controlled runbook workflow. Required if you specify Targets.

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: A key-value mapping to target resources that the runbook operation performs tasks on. Required if you specify TargetParameterName.
Key=tag-key,Values=tag-value-1,tag-value-2

nested_items.name: TargetMaps
nested_items.description: A key-value mapping of runbook parameters to target resources. Both Targets and TargetMaps can't be specified together.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The MaxConcurrency value specified by the user when the operation started, indicating the maximum number of resources that the runbook operation can run on at the same time.

nested_items.name: MaxErrors
nested_items.description: The MaxErrors value specified by the user when the execution started, indicating the maximum number of errors that can occur during the operation before the updates are stopped or rolled back.

nested_items.name: TargetLocations
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts targeted by the current Runbook operation.

nested_items.name: Accounts
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services accounts targeted by the current Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Regions
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Regions targeted by the current Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TargetLocationMaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts allowed to run the Automation concurrently.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationMaxErrors
nested_items.description: The maximum number of errors allowed before the system stops queueing additional Automation executions for the currently running Automation.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleName
nested_items.description: The Automation execution role used by the currently running Automation. If not specified, the default value is AWS-SystemsManager-AutomationExecutionRole.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationAlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm you want to apply to an automation or command.

nested_items.name: IgnorePollAlarmFailure
nested_items.description: When this value is true, your automation or command continues to run in cases where we can't retrieve alarm status information from CloudWatch. In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm specified in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: IncludeChildOrganizationUnits
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to include child organizational units (OUs) that are children of the targeted OUs. The default is false.

nested_items.name: ExcludeAccounts
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services accounts or organizational units to exclude as expanded targets.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: A list of key-value mappings to target resources. If you specify values for this data type, you must also specify a value for TargetParameterName.
Key=tag-key,Values=tag-value-1,tag-value-2

nested_items.name: TargetsMaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of targets allowed to run this task in parallel. This TargetsMaxConcurrency takes precedence over the StartAutomationExecution:MaxConcurrency parameter if both are supplied.

nested_items.name: TargetsMaxErrors
nested_items.description: The maximum number of errors that are allowed before the system stops running the automation on additional targets. This TargetsMaxErrors parameter takes precedence over the StartAutomationExecution:MaxErrors parameter if both are supplied.

nested_items.name: OpsItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of an OpsItem that is created to represent a Change Manager change request.

nested_items.name: AssociationId
nested_items.description: The ID of a State Manager association used in the Automation operation.

nested_items.name: ChangeRequestName
nested_items.description: The name of the Change Manager change request.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of items. If there are no additional items to return, the string is empty.
